body.p: This conclusion is the main change to the proposals in the exposure draft. The Board concluded that the broader principles it developed during its redeliberations addressed the three main concerns expressed by respondents described in paragraph BC268F. Those principles apply to all group share‑based payment transactions, whether they are cash‑settled or equity‑settled. The Board’s conclusions do not result in any changes to the guidance in IFRIC 11 that addressed similar group equity‑settled share‑based payment transactions. Other than the change described above, the Board reaffirmed the proposals in the exposure draft. Therefore, the Board concluded that it was not necessary to re‑expose the amendments before finalising them.
